I've always been a very prideful person. I Never accepted help from people. I was one of those strong-willed people who believed I could power through anything on my own. For the most part, that approach has worked for me my entire life. I've dedicated myself to being a "strong, independent woman" who can overcome anything once I put my mind to it. I kicked a 4 year IV meth habit. I went from being a junkie to being a contributing member of society, with a great family and career.
